sentences.english: After this presentation, we'll have lunch, which is served in the main conference hall.

sentences.english: The design of hall should consider bizygomatic breadth and into deep harmony.

sentences.english: Mr. Tilney was no fonder of the play than the pump-room.

sentences.english: Westminster Hall is the oldest part of Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 威斯敏斯特廳是議會大廈最古老的部分。

sentences.english: A report by Jiangxi Economic and Trade Department also shows the trend of an emulative inrushing of foreign investment.
